mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mgt_user_loan_record_details (loan_id, op_type, amount_type, amount, account_id, op_date) VALUES (#{loanId}, #{opType}, #{amountType}, #{amount}, #{accountId}, #{opDate})
mapper.select: SELECT ld.loan_id, ld.op_type, ld.amount_type, ld.amount, ld.account_id, ld.op_date FROM mgt_user_loan_record_details ld WHERE ld.loan_id = #{loanId}

SELECT IFNULL((SELECT sum(r.borrowing_amount) FROM mgt_user_loan_records r LEFT JOIN mgt_accounts a on r.account_id = a.account_id WHERE a.org_id = #{orgId}) - sum(IF(rs2.amount_type=2,rs2.amount,0)),0)as dueMoney FROM mgt_user_loan_record_details rs2 LEFT JOIN mgt_accounts a2 on rs2.account_id = a2.account_id WHERE a2.org_id = #{orgId};
